name: Developer Marketing: Tutorials & SDK Standards PRD

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Define standards for tutorials and SDK samples to improve developer adoption and success.

sections.title: Formats & Coverage
sections.content: Quickstarts, end-to-end tutorials, reference apps; language/runtime coverage policy.

sections.title: Quality & Style
sections.content: Clarity, step-by-step, testability, CI, version pinning; error handling and logging.

sections.title: Samples & Repos
sections.content: Repo structure, licensing, contribution guidelines, and maintenance schedule.

sections.title: Measurement & Feedback
sections.content: Tutorial completion, issue rate, time-to-first-success, and feedback loops.
